originalText.text: I rented an apartment from Ray back in 2016 that I am still living in 7 years later. It’s a great location, great space, and a seamless application process. The building management is decent, Ray is great!

text.text: I rented an apartment from Ray back in 2016 that I am still living in 7 years later. It’s a great location, great space, and a seamless application process. The building management is decent, Ray is great!

originalText.text: Great broker!! He’s always very courteous, friendly and knows his business. He’s good at getting back to you in a timely manner. I was looking for an apartment for over 3 months and thanks to him found my little place in Manhattan and I’m extremely happy. I highly recommend him.

text.text: Great broker!! He’s always very courteous, friendly and knows his business. He’s good at getting back to you in a timely manner. I was looking for an apartment for over 3 months and thanks to him found my little place in Manhattan and I’m extremely happy. I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: I worked with Ray Vazquez from RV Realty to lease an apartment in the UES part of Manhattan. Ray was always available to chat, and answer my questions to the best of his knowledge. He got me a lease that I was comfortable signing. It isn’t an easy job since he has to work with both management and tenant to come to an agreement, and I appreciate his efforts.

text.text: I worked with Ray Vazquez from RV Realty to lease an apartment in the UES part of Manhattan. Ray was always available to chat, and answer my questions to the best of his knowledge. He got me a lease that I was comfortable signing. It isn’t an easy job since he has to work with both management and tenant to come to an agreement, and I appreciate his efforts.

originalText.text: please be careful with this man, he will con you, take your money and provide you with a bug infested, mice infected, mold and holes plus pipe exposed apartment. He only allows you to pay him in certified checks or cash. It happened to me. Once I paid him the money and I moved my furniture, in the apartment I realized the terrible conditions. I returned the keys and the landlord agreed to give me all my money back. But Ray refused, he said he did his job, clearly he didn't he just stole my money. I asked for him to return my brokers fee deposit as I had moved out less then three days from signing a lease, he also rented the apartment less then one week later. Now Im taking him to court. Please don't fall victim to this thief. Don't pay cash or certified checks to him.

originalText.text: Be careful of this guy. Tried to rent a beautiful apartment with him a few years back. Asked if a cat would possibly be okay. Told me to lie on the application and just not put my cat and that if I got the apartment to just sneak the cat in. A few years later, my boyfriend rented an apartment with him. When he was trying to pay the broker's fee he openly admitted to accepting the fee only in cash so that he would not have to pay taxes on it.
